description: Rules for enforcing reusable components instead of raw HTML elements

rules.name: No raw button elements
rules.message: Use <Button> or <IconButton> component from @/shared/ui instead of raw <button> elements

rules.name: No raw input elements
rules.message: Use reusable input components instead of raw <input> elements. Available components: Input, FormInput, AuthInput, SearchInput, PhoneInput, FileInput, Checkbox, Toggle
rules.suggestion: import { Input, FormInput, AuthInput, SearchInput, PhoneInput, FileInput, Checkbox, Toggle } from '@/shared/ui'

rules.name: No raw textarea elements
rules.message: Use <Textarea> or <AuthInput inputType='textarea'> component from @/shared/ui instead of raw <textarea> elements

rules.name: No raw select elements
rules.message: Use <Select>, <ApiDropdown>, or <UiDropdown> component from @/shared/ui instead of raw <select> elements

rules.name: Prefer Input component over FormInput
rules.message: Use Input, FormInput, or AuthInput components instead of raw <input> elements with type attributes
rules.suggestion: Available input components: Input (basic), FormInput (full-featured), AuthInput (auth pages), SearchInput (search), PhoneInput (phone numbers)

rules.name: No raw badge/tag spans
rules.message: Use <Badge> component for status badges and tags

rules.name: Use Avatar component for user initials
rules.message: Use <Avatar> component for user avatars and initials

rules.name: No raw loading spinners
rules.message: Use <LoadingSpinner> or <LoadingOverlay> component

rules.name: Use Alert component for info/warning/error boxes
rules.message: Use <Alert> component for info/warning/error messages

rules.name: Use AddressFormGroup for address fields
rules.message: Use <AddressFormGroup> component instead of individual address fields

rules.name: No hardcoded primary color
rules.message: Use 'primary' design token instead of hardcoded #D417C8

rules.name: No hardcoded secondary color
rules.message: Use 'secondary' design token instead of hardcoded #14BDEA

rules.name: No hardcoded accent color
rules.message: Use 'accent' design token instead of hardcoded #7767DA

rules.name: No hardcoded success colors
rules.message: Use 'success' design token for success/active states

rules.name: No undocumented teal color
rules.message: Color #00BCD4 is not in design system. Use secondary instead.

rules.name: Discourage gap-3 usage
rules.message: Prefer gap-4 for layouts or gap-2 for tight spacing

rules.name: Avoid low-contrast text
rules.message: Low contrast text may fail WCAG AA. Use text-white/60 minimum.

rules.name: Use isLoading instead of loading prop
rules.message: Use isLoading prop instead of loading for consistency

rules.name: No mb-3 spacing
rules.message: Use standardized margin-bottom values: mb-2, mb-4, mb-6
rules.suggestion: Replace mb-3 with: mb-2 (tight), mb-4 (standard), mb-6 (sections)

rules.name: No mb-5 spacing
rules.message: Use standardized margin-bottom values: mb-4, mb-6, mb-8
rules.suggestion: Replace mb-5 with: mb-4 (standard), mb-6 (sections), mb-8 (large)

rules.name: No p-3 padding
rules.message: Use standardized padding values: p-2, p-4, p-6
rules.suggestion: Replace p-3 with: p-2 (tight), p-4 (standard), p-6 (cards)

rules.name: No p-5 padding
rules.message: Use standardized padding values: p-4, p-6

rules.name: No p-7 padding
rules.message: Use standardized padding values: p-6, p-8
rules.suggestion: Replace p-7 with: p-6 (cards), p-8 (large sections)

rules.name: No px-3 padding
rules.message: Use standardized horizontal padding: px-2, px-4, px-6
rules.suggestion: Replace px-3 with: px-2 (tight), px-4 (standard), px-6 (cards)

rules.name: No px-5 padding
rules.message: Use standardized horizontal padding: px-4, px-6

rules.name: No py-3 padding
rules.message: Use standardized vertical padding: py-2, py-4, py-6
rules.suggestion: Replace py-3 with: py-2 (tight), py-4 (standard), py-6 (cards)

rules.name: No py-5 padding
rules.message: Use standardized vertical padding: py-4, py-6

rules.name: No space-y-3 spacing
rules.message: Use standardized vertical spacing: space-y-2, space-y-4, space-y-6
rules.suggestion: Replace space-y-3 with: space-y-2 (tight), space-y-4 (standard), space-y-6 (sections)

rules.name: No space-y-5 spacing
rules.message: Use standardized vertical spacing: space-y-4, space-y-6, space-y-8
rules.suggestion: Replace space-y-5 with: space-y-4 (standard), space-y-6 (sections), space-y-8 (large)

rules.name: No space-x-3 spacing
rules.message: Use standardized horizontal spacing: space-x-2, space-x-4, space-x-6
rules.suggestion: Replace space-x-3 with: space-x-2 (tight), space-x-4 (standard), space-x-6 (sections)

rules.name: No space-x-5 spacing
rules.message: Use standardized horizontal spacing: space-x-4, space-x-6

rules.name: No responsive padding patterns
rules.message: Avoid responsive padding patterns. Use single padding value.
rules.suggestion: Use single padding value (p-4, p-6) instead of p-5 md:p-6 lg:p-7

rules.name: No sm: breakpoint in grid
rules.message: Use md: breakpoint for grid layouts instead of sm:
rules.suggestion: Replace sm:grid-cols-* with md:grid-cols-* for standard responsive grids

rules.name: Gap placement after grid-cols
rules.message: Place gap classes after grid-cols for consistency
rules.suggestion: Use: grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 gap-4 (not: gap-4 grid-cols-1)

rules.name: No undocumented blue color
rules.message: Color #32A1E4 is not in design system. Use secondary or accent instead.

rules.name: No custom padding in modal children
rules.message: Modal component provides padding. Remove custom p-6 from direct children.
rules.suggestion: Remove p-6 from modal content - Modal provides px-6 py-6 automatically

rules.name: No custom overflow in modal children
rules.message: Modal component handles overflow. Remove custom overflow/max-height.
rules.suggestion: Remove overflow and max-h classes - Modal handles scrolling automatically

rules.name: Use compact text sizes
rules.message: Use text-sm (13px) for body text in compact design. text-base (14px) is for emphasized text only.
rules.suggestion: Replace text-base with text-sm for standard body text

rules.name: Use compact heading sizes
rules.message: Use text-xl (18px) for H1 headings in compact design.
rules.suggestion: Replace text-2xl with text-xl for H1 headings

rules.name: Prefer rounded-md over rounded-lg
rules.message: Use rounded-md (6px) for standard elements in compact design. rounded-lg (8px) is for cards only.
rules.suggestion: Replace rounded-lg with rounded-md for buttons/inputs, or rounded-lg for cards

rules.name: No ring-2 focus (use ring-1)
rules.message: Use ring-1 for focus indicators in compact design (thinner rings).
rules.suggestion: Replace ring-2 with ring-1 for subtle focus indicators
